TechnicalInfo.@Core.Description: A function import for retrieval of technical info

Url.@Core.Description: URL of a CSDL document describing the function
Url.@Core.LongDescription:
This URL is interpreted relative to the URL of the CSDL document containing the annotation.
            The function must follow [this template](#Template_GetTechnicalInfo).

Template_GetTechnicalInfo.@Core.Description: Template for a function that retrieves technical info for a UI service and whose function import is named in [`TechnicalInfo/FunctionImport`](#TechnicalInfoType)

$Parameter.@Core.Description: Root URL of the UI service
$Parameter.@Core.LongDescription: This URL is interpreted relative to the root URL of the service containing the function.

$Parameter.@Core.Description: Path to the model element for which technical info is requested

$ReturnType.@Core.Description: Collection of development objects related to the model element

Url.@Core.Description: Link to open the development object
Url.@Core.LongDescription: This URL is interpreted relative to the root URL of the service containing the function.
